title: Wolfram Training - Mathematica and SystemModeler
description:
Learn about Mathematica, SystemModeler, the Computable Document Format (CDF), and other Wolfram technologies. Wolfram Training courses include quick starts to cover the basics and in-depth looks at concepts and applications. Watch courses on demand according to your schedule or join live courses online, in a classroom, or at your organization.

Video files
===========
